title: Masters of Scale Strategy Session: The Small Business Playbook

masters of scale strategy session
presented in alliance with capital one
business. We are live. Welcome, welcome,
welcome. My name is Jodine Dorsce. I'm
the VP of live events here at Wait, what
the company behind Masters of Scale.
While we get started, please continue to

you have any thoughts or questions

America's
workforce? That doesn't sound that
doesn't sound very small to me. So in
